column1:
#dig start(15;10; Top left corner of central stairs) Surface and farm/depot level digging. We also channel out a future path for invaders.

Consider deforesting the entire 30x20 surface area before beginning. Note that this blueprint will place from the center of the 30x20 area.

The 3rd z-level in this file just digs stairs; if you want to install the waterfall plumbing system later, leave this 3rd level EMPTY for now and start the base proper below that; use basic-dig.csv to dig out areas for future use below.
